channel.title: Run.bat error....[repost]
channel.description:
ive tried to change the run.bat and compile.bat but nothing seems to work, this is the error:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

Try this for your run.bat:

@ECHO OFF TITLE Hockey4lifexxx color 0a JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI PAUSE
[/quote]

read my NEW topic[/quote]

and read my post, that should help.

item.title: Run.bat error....[repost]
item.dc:creator: @tw1nz_ftw tw1nz ftw
item.description:
@tw1nz_ftw wrote:

Hockey, its because you use a run.bat and compile.bat from a Server, they wont work at clients, because some of the server compilers and runners, detects the server.class … and, there isnt any server.class in clients

Read full topic

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]

item.title: Run.bat error....[repost]
item.dc:creator: @manofwar12 manofwar12
item.description:
@manofwar12 wrote:

[quote=“drask182, post:4, topic:168349”]go to my computer,Click “View System informatlion”, then Click “Advanced”,then Click “Environment Variables”.press edit on ur CLASSPATH
change this CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin;%CLASSPATH%; become CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
then…change ur path become C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin into this C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin
then click ok and u can run server and compile[/quote]

that sounds good. do that hockey and then let me know if you are still getting that error, i might know what to do for ya.

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat error....[repost]
item.dc:creator: @drask182 drask182
item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

go to my computer,Click “View System informatlion”, then Click “Advanced”,then Click “Environment Variables”.press edit on ur CLASSPATH
change this CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin;%CLASSPATH%; become CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
then…change ur path become C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin into this C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin
then click ok and u can run server and compile
give rep:

Read full topic
